questions.description: Which of the following product is not formed by heating KMnO₄
The reaction MnO₄¯ + e¯ → MnO₄²¯ takes place in-
The main reason for larger number of oxidation states exhibited by the actinoids than the corresponding lanthanoids, is -

options.description: lesser energy difference between 5f and 6d orbitals than between 4f and 5d orbitals
larger atomic size of actinoids than the lanthanoids
more energy difference between 5f and 6d orbitals than between 4f and 5d orbitals
greater reactive nature of the actinoids than the lanthanoids

questions.description: In context with the transition elements, which of the following statements is incorrect -

options.description: In the highest oxidation states of the first five transition elements (Sc to Mn), all the 4s and 3d electrons are used for bonding.
Once the d5 configuration is exceeded, the tendency to involve all the 3d electrons in bonding decreases.
In addition to the normal oxidation states, the zero oxidation state is also shown by these elements in complexes.
In the highest oxidation states, the transition metal show basic character and form cationic complexes.

questions.description: In context of the lanthanoids, which of the following statement is not correct -

options.description: There is a gradual decrease in the radii of the members with increasing atomic number in the series.
Common oxidation state of lanthanoids is +3
Because of similar properties the separation of lanthanoids is not easy.
Availability of 4f electron results in the formation of compounds in +4 state for all the members of the series

questions.description: Pick out the correct order :-

Assertion : Zn, Cd, Hg are transition metal. 
Reason : Outer most shell is completely filled in Zn, Cd, Hg

options.description: Both Assertion & Reason are True & the Reason is a correct explanation of the Assertion.
Both Assertion & Reason are True but Reason is not a correct explanation of the Assertion
Assertion is True but the Reason is False.

questions.description:

options.description: Both Assertion & Reason are True & the Reason is a correct explanation of the Assertion.
Both Assertion & Reason are True but Reason is not a correct explanation of the Assertion.
Assertion is True but the Reason is False.

questions.description: Although Zirconium belongs to 4d transition series and Hafnium to 5d transition series even then they show similar physical and chemical properties because -

options.description: Both have same number of electrons.
Both have similar atomic radius due to lanthanoid contraction
Both belong to the same group of the periodic table.

Interstitial compounds are formed when small atoms are trapped inside the crystal lattice of metals. Which of the following is not the characteristic property of interstitial compounds -

options.description: They have high melting points in comparison to pure metals.

questions.description:

Reason : Cu²⁺ oxidises I¯ to iodine.

Assertion is not true but reason is true.
Both assertion and reason are false.
